data.meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).
data.sentence: The word لَإِحْدَى comes from the root ا ح د and is associated with the meanings: make/call it one, unity, anyone/anything.ahada ashara (eleven).

data.meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).
data.sentence: The word الْكُبَرِ comes from the root ك ب ر and is associated with the meanings: To be hard, become hard, be grievous, grow up, be great. Kabira/Yakburu: To be exceed anyone in age, become stout and tall, grow big, become great, illustrious, become momentous (affair).
